LISTMONK_app__admin_username.description: Username to log into the application

LISTMONK_app__admin_password.description: Password to log into the application. 8 character max!

LISTMONK_app__root.description: Public root URL of the listmonk installation that'll be used in the messages for linking to images, unsubscribe page etc.

LISTMONK_app__from_email.description: The default 'from' e-mail for outgoing e-mail campaigns

LISTMONK_app__notify_emails.description: List of e-mail addresses to which admin notifications such as import updates, campaign completion, failure etc. should be sent

LISTMONK_app__concurrency.description: Maximum concurrent workers that will attempt to send messages simultaneously

LISTMONK_app__message_rate.description: Maximum number of messages to be sent out per second per worker. This, along with concurrency, should be tweaked to keep the net messages going out per second under the target limit

LISTMONK_upload__s3__aws_access_key_id.description: AWS Access Key for the user to access the bucket. Leaving it empty would default to use instance IAM role
